eas_text: A CIVIL AUTHORITY HAS ISSUED AN ADMINISTRATIVE MESSAGE FOR THE FOLLOWING COUNTIES/AREAS: Maricopa, AZ; AT 04:19 AM ON NOV 18, 2025 EFFECTIVE UNTIL 12:19 PM. MESSAGE FROM WSLF/CAP.
extra_text:
A SAFE Alert has been issued for the Phoenix Police Department. This is the Arizona Department of Public Safety. Phoenix PD is looking for black female, Laverne Hatch, last seen on foot near 1900 West Myrtle Avenue wearing a long sleeve black shirt and blue jeans. She is 76 years old, 5 feet 1 inch tall, 160 pounds, gray hair and black eyes and uses a walker to assist with mobility. She has a medical condition which causes confusion/disorientation

If you have contact with this SAFE Alert, please call 911. Monitor TV and Radio for updates.
